message.content:
cs.NI, cs.CR, cs.SY, cs.DC, cs.IT 

This paper is about policy-based network management (PBNM) for end-to-end QoS management in converged networks. It involves the development of a framework consisting of distributed functional entities managed within a policy-based infrastructure to provide QoS and resource management in converged networks. The paper also discusses the implementation and analysis of various measurement-based admission control schemes developed within a Java-based prototype of the policy-based framework. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category for this paper is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). Other likely sub-categories include cs.CR (Cryptography and Security), cs.SY (Systems and Control), cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing), and cs.IT (Information Theory).
